text: Nicholas Victor Leslie Henson (12 May 1945 - 15 December 2019) was an English actor. He joined the Royal Shakespeare Company in 1977. He was known for his roles in Witchfinder General (1968), There's a Girl in My Soup (1970), Mosquito Squadron (1970) and Psychomania (1971). Henson died on 15 December 2019 from lymphoma, aged 74. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1945 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from lymphoma Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English voice actors Category:English stage actors Category:Actors from London
title: Nicky Henson
